description:
The Linux kernel community is embroiled in a heated debate over the integration of Rust code, with contributors clashing over safety benefits, maintainability challenges, and the potential risks of a multi-language codebase. The discussion, sparked by a policy document published by Rust for Linux lead developer Miguel Ojeda, highlights growing tensions between advocates of memory-safe... Read more »

The post Rust for Linux: Safety gains vs maintainability fears appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Rust for Linux: Safety gains vs maintainability fears

description:
Ever wanted to extract text from an image or scan? Thanks to advancements in optical character recognition (OCR) and AI, this is no longer a distant dream. But while OCR has been around for decades, integrating it into applications can still feel like a challenge. The good news? You don’t have to reinvent the wheel.... Read more »

The post Your guide to OCR APIs: Unlocking text extraction appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Your guide to OCR APIs: Unlocking text extraction
